name: Yuki-Musume, the Ice Mayakashi
text: If you control a "Mayakashi" card, other than "Yuki-Musume, the Ice Mayakashi" while this card is in your hand or GY: You can Special Summon this card, then send 1 Zombie monster from your Deck to the GY. You can only use this effect of "Yuki-Musume, the Ice Mayakashi" once per turn. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Mayakash" monsters.
